titleStmt.title: An answere vnto a wicked & infamous libel made by Christopher Vitel, one of the chiefe English elders of the pretended Family of Loue maintaining their doctrine, & carpingly answeringe to certaine pointes of a boke called the displaing of the Fam. Aunswered by I. Rogers.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, John, fl. 1560-1580.

titleStmt.title: An answere vnto a wicked & infamous libel made by Christopher Vitel, one of the chiefe English elders of the pretended Family of Loue maintaining their doctrine, & carpingly answeringe to certaine pointes of a boke called the displaing of the Fam. Aunswered by I. Rogers.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, John, fl. 1560-1580.
Vitell, Christopher, fl. 1555-1579.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Daye dwelling ouer Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Reprints and replies to a work of Vitell's, apparently no longer extant in its original publication.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
